fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 6M Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 6M] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication of two fields. Translated [Delta Down All CCY 6M]*[Date Sign] to DAX with table-qualified column references because the calculation uses only same-row fields and no aggregations or parameters.
